sentences.en: A lathe consists of five important parts.

sentences.en: Beech turns easily in the lathe.
sentences.cn: 山毛榉在车床上很容易车制。

sentences.en: Business owners lathe, planer, milling, drilling, line cutting, and other processing equipment.
sentences.cn: 企业拥有车床 、 刨床 、 铣床 、 钻床 、 线切割等多种加工设备.

sentences.en: Clutch in headstock makes the lathe start smoothly and brake quickly.
sentences.cn: 在车头离合器使车床顺利启动和制动迅速.

sentences.en: From the garage there came the sound of Derek working a lathe.
sentences.cn: 汽车修理厂那边传来德里克开动车床的声音.

sentences.en: Get lathe No.9 set to turn the new piston.
sentences.cn: 把九号车床调好来车这个新活塞.

sentences.en: Gradually she learned to operate a lathe.
sentences.cn: 她慢慢地学会了开车床.

sentences.en: He turned the wood on a lathe.
sentences.cn: 他在车床上车削了那块木料.

sentences.en: I pressed the button and the lathe began to turn.
sentences.cn: 我按了一下电钮,车床就开始转动起来.

sentences.en: Let's get the lathe to turn the new piston.
sentences.cn: 咱们用车床车[加工]新的活塞吧.

sentences.en: That lathe went out of order at times.
sentences.cn: 那台车床有时发生故障.

sentences.en: The  lathe turns off a shaft in just one minute.
sentences.cn: 车床仅在一分钟内就可车出一根轴。

sentences.en: The paper analyese reason of ordinary lathe faults in operation and gives out the elimination methods.
sentences.cn: 主要介绍了普通车床在运转过程中出现的故障、原因及排除办法。

sentences.en: The workpiece is already on the lathe.
This lathe is easy to operate.
This motion can be used to run a lathe or some other machine.
sentences.cn: 这种旋转运动可用来开动车床或其他机器.

sentences.en: When the plant closed, a lathe came sliding down, like a foot a day, until it hit an oak.
sentences.cn: 那家工厂倒闭的时候，还滑下来过一架车床，差不多一天出溜一尺，直到它撞上了一棵橡树。
